item.title: Women Empowerment Projects
item.description: Women empowerment projects encourage them to improve their livelihood. We have formed Self Help Groups (SHG) for women to be independent. Empowering women is everyoneâ€™s basic duty and we appeal to everyone who is reading this to take care of the women in your family and give your love, time, energy and financial freedom for them. When women in your family live happily, the society grows and so does a Nation.
